{{distinguish|text=Pali, the city in [[Bihar]], [[India]]}} {{travel guide|date=August 2016}} {{Use Indian English|date=February 2015}} {{Use dmy dates|date=February 2015}} {{Infobox settlement | name = Paliganj | other_name = | settlement_type = [[City#India|City]] | image_skyline = | image_caption = Paliganj Collected Photo in which Amit Shah, Election 2015, Paliganj Police Station Board, Achhua Board, Ram Lakhan Singh Yadav College, Government Hospital, Paliganj | pusl guy = India Bihar | pushpin_label_position = right | pushpin_map_caption = Location in Bihar, India | coordinates = {{coord|25|19|37|N|84|48|2|E|display=inline,title}} | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = {{flag|India}} | subdivision_type1 = [[States and territories of India|State]] | subdivision_name1 = [[Bihar]] | subdivision_type2 = Division | subdivision_name2 = [[Patna division|Patna]] | subdivision_type3 = [[List of districts of India|District]] | subdivision_name3 = [[Patna district|Patna]] | subdivision_type4 = [[List of million-plus urban agglomerations in India|UA]] | subdivision_name4 = [[Patna]] | subdivision_type5 = Ward | subdivision_name5 = 16 wards | established_title = Established | established_date = 1987 | government_type = MLA | governing_body = | unit_pref = Metric | area_total_km2 = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 70 | population_footnotes = | population_total = | population_as_of = | population_density_km2 = auto | demographics_type1 = Languages | demographics1_title1 = Spoken | demographics1_info1 = [[Magadhi language|Magadhi]], [[Hindi language|Hindi]] | timezone1 = [[Indian Standard Time|IST]] | utc_offset1 = +5:30 | postal_code_type = [[Postal Index Number|PIN]] | postal_code = 801110 | area_code_type = Telephone code | area_code = 06135 | registration_plate = BR-01 | website = {{URL|paliganjtimes.com}}
{{URL|paliganjexpress.com}} }} '''Paliganj''' is a City in [[Patna district]]. It is Sub-Division of Patna Districts and an [[Constituency#India|Assembly Constituency]] in [[Patna district]] in the [[India]]n [[States and territories of India|State]] of [[Bihar]]. In the Census of 2011, Paliganj has 254,904 of population and approximately 50 km from Patna. ==Politics== In 2015 state assembly election Jai Vardhan Yadav(RJD) defeated Ram Janm Sharma(BJP)with a margin of 24453 voteshttp://www.elections.in/bihar/assembly-constituencies/paliganj.html. Paliganj Assembly Constituency is part of [[Pataliputra (Lok Sabha constituency)]].{{cite web | url =http://www.indiastudychannel.com/india/loksabha/635-Pataliputra.aspx | title = General Election 2009 Assembly constituencies | accessdate = 2009-05-20 | last = | first = | work = Pataliputra| publisher = India elections.co.in}} ==Tourism == Kalyanpur Devi Mandir is Situated 2.5 Km From Paliganj. It is historical Devi Mandir and Peoples says that this is from Ad1878 . Ular Sun Temple is situated at a distance of 3km from Paliganj. It is a historical sun temple and people believe that this temple one of the twelve sun temples built by King Samb on the advice of God Krishna. Another monument in this region is Mughal age library situated at [[Bharatpura]] This library is known as Gopal Narayan Public Library. ==References== {{reflist}} {{Patna Division}} [[Category:Patna district]] [[Category:Cities and towns in Patna district]] [[Category:Neighbourhoods in Patna]]
